description:
Hyoudou Marisa is http://anidb.net/ch88091 [Kiyoharu]`s mother and a dance coach. She is a highly-regarded celebrity and trained her son and http://anidb.net/ch88093 [Shizuku] to becoming elite dancers. She later becomes http://anidb.net/ch88092 [Tatara]`s coach when http://anidb.net/ch92127 [Chinatsu] becomes his dance partner.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Hyoudou Marisa
